statements: UPSERT INTO transportation (id, vehicle_name, capacity, route) VALUES (1, 'car', 4, 'A to B')
UPSERT INTO transportation (id, vehicle_name, capacity, route) VALUES (2, 'bike', 1, 'X to Y')
UPSERT INTO transportation (id, vehicle_name, capacity, route) VALUES (3, 'bus', 30, 'City Loop')

UPSERT INTO vehicles (vehicle_id, vehicle_type, manufacturer, year) VALUES (1, 'Car', 'Toyota', 2022) ON CONFLICT (vehicle_id) DO UPDATE SET vehicle_type = excluded.vehicle_type, manufacturer = excluded.manufacturer, year = excluded.year;

UPSERT INTO vehicles (vehicle_id, vehicle_type, manufacturer, year) VALUES (2, 'Truck', 'Ford', 2021) ON CONFLICT (vehicle_id) DO UPDATE SET vehicle_type = excluded.vehicle_type, manufacturer = excluded.manufacturer, year = excluded.year;

UPSERT INTO routes (route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location) VALUES (1, 'Route 1', 'City A', 'City B') ON CONFLICT (route_id) DO UPDATE SET route_name = excluded.route_name, start_location = excluded.start_location, end_location = excluded.end_location;
UPSERT INTO vehicles (id, name, type) VALUES (1, 'Car', 'Sedan')
UPSERT INTO drivers (id, name, license_number) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', '12345')
UPSERT INTO routes (id, start_location, end_location, distance) VALUES (1, 'City A', 'City B', 100.5)
INSERT INTO Vehicle (vehicle_id, vehicle_type, manufacturer, year) VALUES (1, 'Sedan', 'Toyota', 2022) ON CONFLICT (vehicle_id) DO UPDATE SET vehicle_type = 'SUV', year = 2023
INSERT INTO Driver (driver_id, driver_name, license_number) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', '123456') ON CONFLICT (driver_id) DO UPDATE SET driver_name = 'Jane Doe', license_number = '654321'
INSERT INTO Route (route_id, route_name) VALUES (1, 'City Route') ON CONFLICT (route_id) DO NOTHING
UPSERT INTO vehicles (vehicle_id, make, model, year) VALUES (1, 'Toyota', 'Camry', 2015) ON CONFLICT (vehicle_id) DO UPDATE SET make = 'Toyota', model = 'Camry', year = 2015
UPSERT INTO drivers (driver_id, name, age, license_number) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 30, 'DL1234') ON CONFLICT (driver_id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'John Doe', age = 30, license_number = 'DL1234'

UPSERT INTO trips (trip_id, start_location, end_location, distance, time_duration, vehicle_id, driver_id) VALUES (1, 'City A', 'City B', 50.5, '2 hours', 1, 1) ON CONFLICT (trip_id) DO UPDATE SET start_location = 'City A', end_location = 'City B', distance = 50.5, time_duration = '2 hours', vehicle_id = 1, driver_id = 1
